Package upnp

Class MediaServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ball.upnp.AbstractDevice
      • upnp.MediaServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnnotatedDevice, Description, Device, RootDevice, SSDP
    @DeviceType("urn:schemas-upnp-org:device:MediaServer:4")
@Named
@Singleton
public class MediaServer
extends AbstractDevice
implements RootDevice
    UPnP MediaServer Device which implements ContentDirectory and ConnectionManager Services.
